title: My fps randomly drops
body:
My fps is normally around 60-120 whenever i recall  5 to 10 minutes after the game has started my fps drops to 10 - 20 and it never goes back to normal again until i close my client and open it and the same problem happens in the same game after the next recall or team fight 
that never happen before and making my graphics lower is not an option and it doesn't help.

replies.body:
There could be many different factors affecting your FPS, however, FPS drops after a period of time in a match is generally an indication that there are missing or corrupt league assets. As a first step, I recommend working through our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), since it goes over the most common solutions for this problem.

Let me know if you notice any change after working through those steps.
